Review Text: made of durable, strong plastic; not flimsy or squeezable like cheaper plastic bottles..nice size and shape. twist open/close spray nozzle. good height, so won’t topple over, even when empty.

Empty Brown Glass Spray Bottles2-Pack, Refillable 16 oz Containers for Essential Oils, Cleaning Products, Aromatherapy, Misting Plants, or Cooking - Reliable Sprayer with Mist and Stream Settings
Cherry
{'Brand': 'Cherry', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.09 x 6.46 x 3.35 inches; 4.94 Ounces', 'UPC': '791523234187'}
nice set of spray bottles!! I used it to mix/dilute bleach and other chemical products that needed to be in new, unrecycled bottles. sprayer works fine, although one of them did leak when i turned the bottle upside down. not sure if that would happen with all the bottles, or just this one sprayer that i received. if you have other "plastic" spray bottles around your house, it will be easy to forget that this one is GLASS, so just be careful.
nice set of glass bottles!!
No Brainer Gentle Facial Cleanser, 6 fl. oz, For Dry & Sensitive Skin, Leaves Skin Feeling Clean, Soft and Hydrated, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein & Amino Acids Restores Skin by Higher Education Skincare
Higher Education

[[VIDEOID:b3f95d0500123286d6c86e59790a77bd]] i appreciate a product that has a safety foil, so thumbs up for that! nice, clean scent, that reminds me of cucumbers. a thick, almost gel like consistency; doesn't lather very much, but still leaves face feeling fresh, clean, soft and smooth!
nice scent, gentle cleanser

{'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All, Dry', 'Brand': 'Bouquet Garni', 'Scent': 'Garni', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 6.34 x 3.66 inches; 1.34 Pounds'}
[[VIDEOID:5a1f001511c47e51512c7544aeef60f4]] if you like a musky scent, then this soap is for you. it lathers well (see video) and has a somewhat strong musk scent; not overly strong, but definitely not light. did not dry out my skin. packaged well in a box; pump has a safety guard that doesn't allow the pump to be pressed until it's removed.
lathers well

profile:
The user continues to prioritize high-quality, value-oriented personal grooming products, particularly in skincare and hair care, while also demonstrating a keen interest in versatile household items. Their recent acquisition of a refillable spray bottle emphasizes their commitment to durability and functionality, aligning with their preference for eco-friendly options. The user values products made from strong materials that offer practical features, such as adjustable nozzles, which cater to their diverse needs ranging from hair care to cleaning tasks.

Their feedback reflects a clear appreciation for items that embody reliability and thoughtful design, reinforcing their established focus on effective and premium products. The user maintains high standards for both personal care and home management, ensuring that all purchased items contribute positively to their day-to-day life. Additionally, they continue to explore sustainable solutions and DIY possibilities that resonate with their resourceful approach.

Overall, the user's behavior illustrates a steadfast dedication to quality, sustainability, and multifunctionality, complemented by their growing interest in diverse fragrance experiences, enhancing their overall self-care philosophy.
